title: Deactivated Probe
summaries: The Deactivated Probe is a pet-summoning item dropped from The Destroyer in Master Mode with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance. It summons a small version of The Destroyer named Destroyer-Lite as a pet that follows the player around.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a miniature tool of destruction
'It's safe to operate this, right?'
statistics.Sell: 5
